mapper.select: SELECT member_name -- 작성자 , review_content -- 내용 , review_star -- 별점 FROM review ORDER BY review_regdate DESC LIMIT 3;
mapper.insert: insert into review ( review_idx, member_email, member_name, review_title, review_content, review_regdate, review_updateDate, review_star, review_viewcnt ) value ( #{review_idx}, #{member_email}, #{member_name}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{review_star}, 0 )
